thread.title: Herbert Schaffer
thread.title_full: Sportbike Track Gear reviewed by Herbert Schaffer

author: Herbert Schaffer
title: Herbert Schaffer
text:
I've only purchased tires from STG, but am happy with the price and quick delivery.
This is the third tire purchase from STG and the price is always competitive with other stores.
I anticipate expanding my purchases to KG oil & air filters in the near future.
The bonus buck program are an enticing approach to expanding your business.
